original_text: The young man, who was the most honored of all his father’s family, lost no time in doing what they said, because he was delighted with Jacob’s daughter.
korean_text: 이 소년이 그 일 행하기를 지체하지 아니하였으니 그가 야곱의 딸을 사랑함이며 그는 그의 아버지 집에서 가장 존귀하였더라

sentences.original_text: who was the most honored of all his father's family
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 집안에서 가장 존귀하게 여겨진 자였는데

sentences.original_text: lost no time in doing what they said
because he was delighted with Jacob's daughter
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 야곱의 딸을 매우 기뻐했기 때문이었다
